name: Cat Dasher
description:
You are Dasher a space cat set on earning as many star points as possible by happily dashing through dangerous life threathening obstacles... FOR FUN!

This is CatDasher, My first game I have somewhat finished as a side project while learning about game development and improving my skills as a game developer.

Hope u enjoy it! Any feedback is welcome as I am still learning!

Controls:

It is recommended to play this game with a mouse!

LMB = Move
RMB = Dash


Songs used:

Song: Jnathyn - Dioma [NCS Release] Music provided by NoCopyrightSounds Free Download/Stream: http://NCS.io/Dioma Watch:  Youtube

Song: Tom Wilson - Run For Your Life (ft. M.I.M.E) [NCS Release] Music provided by NoCopyrightSounds Free Download/Stream: http://NCS.io/RunForYourLife Watch: Youtube
